wikipedia_page.main: Annette Bryn Parri is a Welsh pianist, best known as an accompanist to opera stars such as Bryn Terfel, Rebecca Evans and Jason Howard. Parri appears regularly on the National Eisteddfod stage, and also at the International Eisteddfod at Llangollen.

response: Following the death of Richard Huw Morris,S4C Cofio - Hogia'r Wyddfa. Accessed 27 September 2015 a search was conducted for a successor, eventually leading to the selection of Annette Bryn Parri, who has a separate career as an accompanist to other artists and as part of the duo Piantel.Sain Records - Annette Bryn Parri. Accessed 27 September 2015
* Yn Canu Cancuon – Songs of Meirion Williams Bryn Terfel (baritone), Annette Bryn Parri (piano): (1993) Sain – SCD2013
*Annette Bryn Parri (fl. 2000s), Welsh classical pianist and accompanist
